review: Having just moved into an area with minimal TV programming and satellite being the only option. This is great, we watch movies, childrens programming. review: I had bought this to replace an older Roku2 device because of the price, but sent it back because of the quality of play. It would constantly stop what you were watching to buffer to a point of annoyance (both the old Roku2 and the Fire stick were used on the same TV across the same wi-fi network so it was easy to compare and see the difference). I ended up sending it back and getting the current, slightly more expensive Roku3.
